description:
Erwin Josef von Goldenbaum II was the 37th and penultimate Kaiser of the Goldenbaum Dynasty. He ruled over the http://anidb.net/ch1534 [Galactic Empire] in name only for about two years, with Prime Minister http://anidb.net/ch186 [Reinhard von Lohengramm] holding most of the power, and was a key member of a http://anidb.net/ch6226 ["legitimate" Imperial government-in-exile] on Heinessen for nearly a year.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Erwin Josef II
